alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Taylor County through 645 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Westboro to 8 miles northeast of Thorp. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chelsea and Westboro around 625 PM CDT. Rib Lake around 630 PM CDT. People attending the Taylor County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Wisconsin.
